name: Luxury Wellness Massage Chair
descr:
Ultimate wellness and massage in one luxury chair.

 Description:

*Four massage rollers inside the back,knead & tap
*Five automatic programs easy and convenient to use
*Air massage in thigh,calf and foot position
*Disconnect two-section air massage
*The angle of backrest and footrest can be adjust
*The length of the foot putting shelf adjustable ,stretched,retractable to meet individual need measuring the figure automatically with infray

 

Specifications: 220V 50/60Hz, 120 Watt, 146x84x75 cm and weight 90 kg.
